entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-08-01
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Settings.bundle/Root.plist doesn't get included in iOS bundle. Maui.Storage.Prefernces has no methods to save "shared" settings into device settings. #9122
  • Failed processing manifest in migrated maui app #9120
  • Missing PointerOver VisualState for Button on Windows #9119
  • Issues AMM0000 error in the AndroidManifest #9118
  • Maui Blazor fails to show messagebox in Release configuration on Android #9117
  • ImageSourceInitializesCorrectly currently failing on WinUI #9115
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Setting Shell.BackButtonBehavior in Xaml Sometimes Fails #9114
  • Resolve issues with the Switch Track Color tests on Windows #9113
    .NET 7 Planning
  • Windows Layout InputTransparencyInitializesCorrectly(true) test currently failing #9112
    6.0-sr5
  • Android Frames with HasShadow set to True do not honor ZIndex properly #9108
  • Entry Control in Secondary Layout Shows Text in Single Column when Keyboard Showing #9106
  • Label:[WinUI] FontFamily is not recognized in Unpackaged application. #9104
  • Shell: Flyout menu items are missing in MAUI windows #9103
  • Button Text wrap #9102
  • Reduce Image usage memory #9101
  • Border can set multi StrokeThickness; Frame can set multi CornerRadius #9100
  • Frame missing its bottom edge #9099

Closed

  • Debugger not debugging some variables correctly #7009
  • iOS SearchBar "Cancel" button gets rendered inconsistently #8425
    6.0-servicing
  • Running samples not possible: XamarinTelemetry failed #9096
  • . #9116
  • Child view size exceeds the parent view size #4749
    6.0-servicing
  • FlexLayout wrapping behaves oddly on Windows #3482
    6.0-servicing
  • CollectionView does not resize when items becomes invisible #9023
  • SetFlowDirection/LayoutFlowDirectionAlwaysMapToLeftToRight tests are currently failing on WinUI #9111
    6.0-sr5
  • Method of a custom view gets callled before the constructor when an implicit style is used #9050
  • Label with multispan formatted text breaks on Android when using HorizontalTextAlignment #7365

PullRequests

Created

  • Convert Controls.Tests from NUnit to xUnit #9123
  • Fix TextColor for SearchBar and CheckBox on Windows #9121
  • Dev/branch net7 #9109

Merged

  • [Housekeeping] Added more Windows Device Tests (added around 900 tests) #8854
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Exclude `global.json` from iOS Bundle Resources #8724
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Pin net6 branch #9051
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22373.2 to 7.0.0-preview1.22379.1 #9105
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Xamarin.Build.Download from 0.11.2 to 0.11.3 #9070
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Updated

  • [Android] Update Entry behavior closing the Keyboard #7635
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-servicing
  • [Android] Fix crash using ContentViews inside CollectionView #8051
    t/bug, area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, 6.0-sr3
  • Implement .NET MAUI Maps #7886
    area/controls 🎮, control-map, .NET 7
  • Disconnect old handler after setting new handler #8781
    area/controls 🎮
  • Fixes for case-sensitive filesystems #9076
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Force DisableFastUpToDateCheck=false for MAUI repo build #9083
    do-not-merge, area/infrastructure 🏗️
